targets.rawSql:
SELECT
timestamp as time,
-- value[1] as "FT",
value[2] as "TM",
value[3] as "SYIM"
FROM
(
SELECT * FROM
 scaler
WHERE trigger = 'SpillOn'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 400
)
AS A ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
timestamp as time,
--value[1] as "FT",
--value[2] as "TM",
--value[3] as "SYIM",
value[4] as "BHT",
value[5] as "T0",
value[6] as "AC",
value[7] as "T1",
value[8] as "DEF",
value[9] as "Veto",
value[10] as "Calori",
value[11] as "BTC",   
value[12] as "CDH1",          
value[13] as "CDH2",
value[14] as "CDH3",
value[15] as "NC",
value[16] as "CVC"
-- value[17] as "BeamAsBHTxT0",
-- value[53] as "Clock10kHz",
-- value[54] as "tmp54",
-- value[55] as "tmp55",
-- value[56] as "tmp56",
-- value[57] as "tmp57",
-- value[58] as "tmp58",
-- value[59] as "tmp59",
-- value[60] as "tmp60",
-- value[61] as "tmp61",
-- value[62] as "tmp62",
-- value[63] as "tmp63",
-- value[64] as "ClockTrigger"
FROM
(
SELECT * FROM
 scaler
WHERE trigger = 'SpillOn'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 400
)
AS A ORDER BY timestamp
